description:
My name is Ken Rothrock, and from my Hillsborough, North Carolina, law office, Rothrock Law Firm, P.A., I devote my time and resources to helping individuals and families with their most important and pressing legal needs. Serving clients in Hillsborough, Durham, Roxboro, Burlington and the surrounding areas, as well as throughout North Carolina, my law firm and I provide effective support and assistance to those who are dealing with any of the following legal issues:

  • Workers' compensation
  • Personal injury
  • Premises liability accidents
  • Commercial truck accidents
  • Traffic violations
  • Criminal record expungements

Having practiced law for over 35 years, I possess the skills and resources necessary to handle the demands of your case regardless of the challenges or complexities involved. Throughout my career, I have helped thousands of clients recover the compensation and benefits they deserve after suffering an injury or loss caused by another party's negligence. In addition, I have also helped clients fight traffic offenses, from speeding tickets to DWI, as well as having effectively had many of my clients' criminal records expunged.

If you need an attorney who will aggressively advocate for your rights and best interests while working hard to achieve the most favorable outcome possible on your behalf, look no further than Rothrock Law Firm, P.A. My law firm offers free initial consultations, and I do not charge a fee for personal injury and wrongful death cases unless I recover damages for you.
